item.title: Paschi 据称将跨越 Mediobanca 50% 的门槛，赢得控制权
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，Banca Monte dei Paschi di Siena SpA 赢得了 Mediobanca SpA 一半以上的投票权，实际上控制了这家意大利投资银行。【原文：Banca Monte dei Paschi di Siena SpA has won over more than half of Mediobanca SpA’s voting rights, according to people familiar with the matter, effectively giving it control over the Italian investment bank.】

item.title: Citadel 的乌比德称美国经济处于 "脆弱 "平衡状态
item.description: Citadel 的顶级经济学家 Angel Ubide 认为，美国经济和劳动力市场正处于脆弱的平衡状态，而长期国债收益率是判断这种背景是否正在恶化的关键指标。【原文：The US economy and labor market are in a fragile balance, and long-term Treasury yields are the key indicator to determine whether that backdrop is deteriorating, according to Angel Ubide, a top economist at Citadel.】

item.title: Klarna 和 Netskope 首次公开募股为加拿大顶级养老基金带来收益
item.description: 加拿大养老金计划投资委员会（Canada Pension Plan Investment Board）准备将其持有的两家私募股权公司推向公开市场，因为科技公司对新股的需求大增。【原文：Canada Pension Plan Investment Board is poised to see two of its private equity holdings hit the public market as technology companies take advantage of the appetite for new shares.】

item.title: 瑞士立法者投票反对推迟实施瑞银资本新规
item.description: 瑞士立法者投票赞成加快出台银行资本质量新规定，此举可能使瑞银集团最早在明年将资本要求提高约 30 亿美元。【原文：Swiss lawmakers voted for a faster introduction of new rules for banks’ capital quality, a move that could raise UBS Group AG’s capital requirements by some $3 billion as early as next year.】

item.title: 有关于另一场启示录的传闻
item.description: 大家好，欢迎收看《奇货可居》时事通讯，这里每天都有来自《奇货可居》的精彩内容。有时是我们乔-韦森塔尔（Joe Weisenthal）和特蕾西-阿洛维（Tracy Alloway）为您带来我们对市场、金融和经济最新发展的看法。有时是我们的专家嘉宾和消息来源网络提供的内容。不管是什么，我们保证永远有趣。【原文：Hello and welcome to the newsletter, a grab bag of daily content from the Odd Lots universe. item.title: 美国陆军授予 Anduril-META 团队、Rivet 战斗护目镜合同
item.description: 美国陆军授予由 Anduril Industries 公司和 Meta Platforms 公司组成的合伙企业以及由 Rivet Industries 公司牵头的另一家企业合同，以生产新型作战护目镜的竞争原型。【原文：The US Army awarded contracts to a partnership of Anduril Industries Inc. and Meta Platforms Inc., and another led by Rivet Industries, to produce competing prototypes of a new combat goggle.】

item.title: KNDS 首席执行官称法德油轮制造商正准备首次公开募股
item.description: KNDS NV 首席执行官让-保罗-阿拉里（Jean-Paul Alary）表示，他正在为这家法德油罐制造商的首次公开募股做准备，以扩大股东基础，促进投资和收购。【原文：KNDS NV Chief Executive Officer Jean-Paul Alary said he’s preparing the Franco-German tankmaker for an initial public offering to bolster the shareholder base and enable investments and acquisitions.】

item.title: 南非经济研究局称，投资停滞将使南非经济增长低于 2
item.description: 南非经济研究局（Bureau for Economic Research）称，南非必须加快推进拖延已久的经济改革，并对国有企业进行全面改革，以摆脱长期的低增长状态。【原文：South Africa must hasten long-delayed economic reforms and overhaul state-owned companies to escape a prolonged period of subpar growth, according to the Bureau for Economic Research.】

item.title: 纽约警察局的蒂施对联邦军队驻扎在纽约街头的想法感到 "反感
item.description: 纽约市警察局长不希望看到国民警卫队在美国最大城市的街道上巡逻，并对唐纳德-特朗普总统将军队部署到城市地区的前景感到 "反感"。【原文：New York City’s police commissioner doesn’t want to see the National Guard patrolling the streets of the nation’s biggest city and is “revolted” by the prospect of President Donald Trump deploying the military to urban areas.】

item.title: 双线称美联储降息将导致收益率曲线趋于平稳
item.description: DoubleLine Capital 的比尔-坎贝尔（Bill Campbell）表示，如果美联储推出激进的降息措施，美国的收益率曲线将进一步陡峭化。【原文：The US yield curve has further to steepen should the Federal Reserve unleash aggressive interest rate cuts, DoubleLine Capital’s Bill Campbell said.】

item.title: 灾害加剧，美国财产保险费用再创新高
item.description: 今年上半年，美国的财产保险费用创下历史新高，因为在加利福尼亚等最近受到气候灾害影响的州，房主们面临着大幅涨价的问题。【原文：The cost of property insurance in the US rose to an all time-high in the first half of the year, as homeowners faced sharp price increases in states recently affected by climate-related disasters, such as California.】

item.title: 灾害每年损坏非洲 127 亿美元的基础设施
item.description: 根据抗灾基础设施联盟（Coalition for Disaster Resilient Infrastructure）的数据，在非洲，包括建筑物在内的基础设施每年因灾害造成的平均损失为 127 亿美元。【原文：The average annual loss of infrastructure including buildings caused by disasters in Africa is $12.7 billion, according to the Coalition for Disaster Resilient Infrastructure.】

item.title: 飞利浦因睡眠呼吸暂停设备安全问题面临法国的深入调查
item.description: 法国检察官加大了对荷兰皇家飞利浦公司的调查力度，指控其呼吸设备可能对人体健康造成危害，并委派一名拥有更深入调查权的地方法官领导此案。【原文：French prosecutors stepped up an investigation into Royal Philips NV for potentially causing danger to human health with breathing devices, tasking a magistrate with deeper probing powers to lead the case.】

item.title: 据说 Klarna 将把 IPO 定价定在最高或高于营销范围的水平
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，Klarna Group Plc 正向投资者透露，该公司预计将以最高价或高于营销区间的价格首次公开发行股票，发行价高达 12.7 亿美元。【原文：Klarna Group Plc is telling investors it expects to price its initial public offering of as much as $1.27 billion at the top end or above the marketing range, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: DP World 赢得蒙特利尔港新码头运营合同
item.description: 物流巨头 DP World Ltd. 将在蒙特利尔附近运营一个新码头，该项目旨在将该地区港口的集装箱装卸能力提高 50%以上。【原文：Logistics giant DP World Ltd. will operate a new terminal near Montreal, a project aimed at boosting the container-handling capacity of the region’s port by more than 50%.】

item.title: Cognition AI 通过新融资实现 100 亿美元估值
item.description: 人工智能初创公司Cognition AI Inc.在一轮约4亿美元的融资中估值达到102亿美元。【原文：Artificial intelligence startup Cognition AI Inc. has reached a valuation of $10.2 billion in a roughly $400 million funding round — a deal that highlights the continued investor frenzy around AI-powered software development.】

item.title: 欧洲考虑弱化俄罗斯天然气淘汰液化天然气终端规则
item.description: 欧盟正考虑在禁止向俄罗斯液化天然气供应商提供终端服务的提议上出尔反尔，这可能会削弱逐步停止购买天然气以资助弗拉基米尔-普京的战争机器的计划。【原文：The European Union is considering backtracking on a proposed ban on providing terminal services to Russian liquefied natural gas suppliers, potentially weakening a plan to phase out the gas purchases helping to fund Vladimir Putin’s war machine.】

item.title: 欧洲央行限制黑盒模型以结束风险贷款僵局
item.description: 欧洲中央银行（European Central Bank）已经结束了与银行在需要为高风险贷款预留多少资金问题上的长期对峙，在此之前，欧洲中央银行减少了对其要求的数十亿额外准备金背后的一个有争议的模型的使用。【原文：The European Central Bank has ended a long standoff with banks over how much money they need to set aside for risky loans, after scaling back use of a controversial model behind its demand for billions in additional provisions.】

item.title: 国际刑事法院推迟杜特尔特听证会以决定他是否适合受审
item.description: 国际刑事法院决定推迟确认对菲律宾前总统罗德里戈-杜特尔特指控的听证会，以确定他的身体状况是否足以接受审判。【原文：The International Criminal Court has decided to postpone a hearing on the confirmation of charges against former Philippine President Rodrigo Duterte to determine whether he is well enough to stand trial.】
